title: How do you get views on twitch??
body:
Title :D
I'm trying out streaming but I've go no views at all, sooo im wondering if you guys have any tips for me. It'd be highly appreciated
twitch - twitch.tv/xsircution

replies.body:
it takes quite a while to build a fan base, and you need to establish an identity. 

what can the viewer expect when they tune in?

what makes your stream entertaining?
Ahhhh, thats actually pree gud. Alright time to streamm!! (with low quality :P)

advertise on sh.it like this place

put a good and fancy title like idk
STREAMING OCE SWAG DARIUS   ( ͡º ͜ʖ ͡º)
ofc, why didnt i thought of that
I went to watch and then realized you spelt twitch wrong XD Oh and its a great stream btw :)

ohh sht lols
lemme edit that
